results.content:
Great course for beginners. I've learned a lot about HTML and CSS. 
Totally loved course, the course is simple, easy to follow and at the same time direct to the point. 
John is a great teacher and it was great start of my journey in this field.

results.content: It is very good to those who don't know how to code. You can make your personal and business website very easily even though you don't know how to code. I highly recommend this course who wants to have simple website.

results.content:
A great course! I really enjoyed the fast pace of the course. Those that have less experience may find it too fast, but he lives up to his promise and presents a lot of value in a short time!

I have to add that nearly everything he said was relevant--no fluff or wasted effort. I appreciated that! Admittedly I knew a bit of HTML but my goal was to get a good intro to Bootstrap and he came through with flying colors!!! While I may have been a bit intimidated learning Bootstrap at first, he showed me that it's very simple! I'll be taking more of John's courses and will be signing up for Ruby this weekend!
results.content_html:

results.content: Excellent presentation and highly instructional. Learnt so much in such a short time. Very inspiring teacher.

results.content:
about to finish the first resume website, this course is zero bull$h#t and straight to the point. I was learning all the tags and css myself trying to memorize everything and losing enthusiasm  , this course rescued me from the abyss. Great job. 
I still recommend you study up more about html tags and css on your own and use this course to sort of 'put it together'

results.content:
If you want to set up your online resume without cracking your head to design a good one, John Elder shows you other alternative that is to search for free or paid resume templates and tweak the template to your liking.

I like the final section of the course where John Elder shows you how you can host your online resume for free using Git and Heroku.
results.content_html:
If you want to set up your online resume without cracking your head to design a good one, John Elder shows you other alternative that is to search for free or paid resume templates and tweak the template to your liking.

I like the final section of the course where John Elder shows you how you can host your online resume for free using Git and Heroku.
